alert.note: Alert for Codington; Day; Deuel; Grant; Hamlin; Marshall; Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 9:20PM MDT until June 20 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Traverse County in west central Minnesota... Big Stone County in west central Minnesota... Deuel County in northeastern South Dakota... Roberts County in northeastern South Dakota... Northeastern Day County in northeastern South Dakota... Northeastern Marshall County in northeastern South Dakota... Northeastern Hamlin County in northeastern South Dakota... Grant County in northeastern South Dakota... Eastern Codington County in northeastern South Dakota... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1019 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Veblen Flats Housing to near Summit to near Estelline, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Toronto, Brandt and Marvin around 1030 PM CDT. Wilmot and Astoria around 1035 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include New Effington, Corona, Twin Brooks, Victor, Big Stone Lake, Milbank, Rosholt, Lismore Colony, Big Stone City, Whiterock Colony, Lagoona Beach, Ortonville, Odessa and Immanuel Church. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Codington; Day; Deuel; Grant; Hamlin; Marshall; Roberts
